name: Extremely Hard Jumping Roguelike Game
description:
This is a roguelike jumping platformer developed by Cranberry studios. It is similar to doodle jump, but there are 10 levels and each level gets harder. Feel free to report bugs or leave suggestions in the comments. We hope you enjoy!

Music in this game

Cascade by Kubbi
